feature1.explanation: Both texts use quotation marks to denote direct speech or emphasize certain words.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, formal tone, and absence of spelling errors, it is moderately likely that the two texts were written by the same author.
